Class dom.session.CreateClientInfo 

java.lang.Object
    |
    +----dom.session.CreateClientInfo
public class CreateClientInfo
extends java.lang.Object
A wrapper class for encapsulating information about remote DObject presence construction. An instance of this class is provided by the local ViewListManager to the local presence of a DObject when a new View is added to the multipoint group. The DObject typically will respond to this information by requesting the construction of a remote client presence.

Author:
Scott Lewis
See Also:
createClient, notifyClientCreation
